main event: An unidentified aerial device was sighted over Gravesville, New York on June 21, 1954, exhibiting unusual maneuverability and high speed. The device appeared to be metallic/silver in color and flashed brightly as it moved, also changing angles and directions rapidly before disappearing behind clouds.
interesting points: The device displayed unusual maneuverability and high speed, flashing brightly as it moved.
Observers reported the device appearing to change angles and directions rapidly, and at times seeming to be stationary.
The Gravesville City Police intervened in response to the sighting.
The report mentions that the credibility of the event is considered fair, and efforts are being made to obtain visual evidence via high-quality film and analysis.
The incident is being studied by the Air Force and a paragovernmental agency in Ohio.
witnesses: AI controlled C-14S observers, Gravesville City Police
